text: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
Everything negative – pressure, challenges – is an opportunity to rise.
You must do the things you think you cannot do.
Fear is the disease. Hustle is the antidote.
If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.
I am among those who think that science has great beauty.
The first principle is that you must not fool yourself – and you are the easiest person to fool.
Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field.

I am among those who think that science has great beauty. A scientist in his laboratory is not only a technician: he is also a child facing natural phenomena that impress him as though they were fairy tales.
The only way to get better is to push yourself beyond your limits.
Discipline equals freedom.
I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
I am among those who think that science has great beauty. A scientist in his laboratory is not only a technician: he is also a child facing an experiment whose result will remain unknown.
The first principle is that you must not fool yourself—and you are the easiest person to fool.
I am among those who think that science has great beauty. A scientist in his laboratory is not only a technician: he is also a child facing natural phenomena with awe.
The only way to get to the other side is to go through it.
I am among those who think that science has great beauty. A scientist in his laboratory is not only a technician: he is also a child facing natural phenomena with awe and wonder.
You are not going to find your best self until you start to get uncomfortable.
You are not going to find a way to get through this without suffering. You have to embrace the pain and use it to fuel your fire.
I am among those who think that science has great beauty. A scientist in his laboratory is not only a technician: he is also a child facing an unknown world.
You are stopping you. You are giving up instead of getting hard.
